title: Misfit's $100 Shine 2 is thinner and smarter than its first-gen activity-tracker
text:
Misfit's $100 Shine 2 is thinner and smarter than its first-gen activity-tracker 
Published By: Macworld.com - Today 
Activity-tracking wristbands are a dime a dozen these days, but each device takes a different approach to monitoring your fitness. Some pret...
